text: Homer Eugene Mechling (March 24, 1909 – January 26, 1975) was an American professional basketball player. He played in the National Basketball League for the Cincinnati Comellos during the 1937–38 season and averaged 6.0 points per game. ==References== Category:1909 births Category:1975 deaths Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Ohio Category:Capital Crusaders men's basketball players Category:Cincinnati Comellos players Category:Guards (basketball) Category:High school basketball coaches in the United States Category:People from Muskingum County, Ohio
title: Gene Mechling
